doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 传送网-省内干线指标录入

sql.name: transportnetworkinnerprovincialroutequartyreportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: transportnetworkinnerprovincialroutequartyreport.group
transportnetworkinnerprovincialroutequartyreport.left
sql.item: select ' ',trim('省内长途网-管道长度(公里)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-光缆长度(皮长公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('其中:管道光缆长度(皮长公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('其中:直埋光缆长度(皮长公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('其中:架空光缆长度(皮长公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-光缆纤芯长度 (芯公里)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-租用光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-光缆纤芯长度-已占用纤芯长度(芯公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-波分复用系统长度(公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-同步数字系列设备套数-其中：10Gb/s设备(套)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-同步数字系列设备套数-其中：2.5Gb/s设备(套)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省内长途网-同步数字系列设备套数-其中：622Mb/s以下设备(套)') from dual

sql.name: transportnetworkinnerprovincialroutequartyreport.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('省内长途网-管道长度(公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000004) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-光缆长度(皮长公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000005) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('其中:管道光缆长度(皮长公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000006) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('其中:直埋光缆长度(皮长公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000010) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('其中:架空光缆长度(皮长公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000011) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-光缆纤芯长度 (芯公里)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000012) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-租用光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000014) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-光缆纤芯长度-已占用纤芯长度(芯公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000015) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-波分复用系统长度(公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000016) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-同步数字系列设备套数-其中：10Gb/s设备(套)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000020) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-同步数字系列设备套数-其中：2.5Gb/s设备(套)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000021) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途网-同步数字系列设备套数-其中：622Mb/s以下设备(套)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000022) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
